note.p: Clergyman. MA, University of Giessen, 1863; DD, 1868. Deacon, 1863; priest, 1864. Curate of Holmfirth, 1863; of St Paul’s, Huddersfield, 1864–8. Incumbent of St Paul’s Episcopal, Glasgow, 1868–78. Subsequently priest at St Peter’s, Brockley, St Cuthbert’s, Birmingham, and All Saints, Jersey.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/629/14/21) 1891 (RG12/2362/7/7)
Census returns of Scotland 1871 (The National Archives of Scotland: Glasgow Barony 45/26)
Census returns of the Channel Islands 1901 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG13/5313/73/12), 1911 (RG14/34890/232)
